description: Security descriptor for SAP CAP TypeScript HR Application

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.HRAdmin
scopes.description: HR Administrator - full access to all HR data and operations

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.HREditor
scopes.description: HR Editor - read and write access to assigned company codes

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.HRViewer
scopes.description: HR Viewer - read-only access to assigned company codes

attributes.name: CompanyCode
attributes.description: Company code(s) the user is authorized to access

role-collections.name: HREditor
role-collections.description: HR Editor - edit access for assigned companies

role-collections.name: HRViewer
role-collections.description: HR Viewer - read-only access for assigned companies
